com.carrotgarden.maven.scr

Class CarrotOsgiScr

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.carrotgarden.maven.scr.CarrotOsgiScr
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CarrotOsgiScrClean, CarrotOsgiScrGenerate

    public abstract class CarrotOsgiScr
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Base for Maven goals.

      Location of generated DS component descriptor files in final bundle.
